thread.title: Where Corporate Taxes Are Poised to Rise Because of Tax Overhaul: States

author: Richard Rubin
title: Where Corporate Taxes Are Poised to Rise Because of Tax Overhaul: States
text:
WASHINGTONâ€”The amount of income subject to corporate taxes on the state level will increase by 12% because of the federal-tax overhaul, which removed or limited tax breaks, according to a business-backed study.
When the top federal corporate-tax rate was 35%, state corporate-tax rates ranging from 3% to 12% were relatively insignificant for many big companies. But now, with the federal rate at 21% and fewer breaks available, state corporate taxes are becoming increasingly important.
